text.*:
Comic Con Experience
Comic Con Experience in São Paulo in 2015.
Status Active
Genre Speculative fiction
Venue São Paulo Expo
Location(s) São Paulo, SP
Olinda, PE (CCXP Tour Nordeste)
Country Brazil
Inaugurated December 4, 2014; 3 years ago (2014-12-04)
Attendance 227,451 in 2017[1]
Organized by Omelete
Filing status Non-profit
Website www.ccxp.com.br

Comic Con Experience (also known simply as CCXP) is a Brazilian multi-genre entertainment and comic convention. It is based on the San Diego Comic-Con and has attractions and contents about comics, TV series, movies, video games, literature and internet. It is the largest pop culture festival in the world.[2]

Contents

  • 1 History
    • 1.1 History of each show
  • 2 References
  • 3 External links

History[edit]

The first edition was held in December 2014 in São Paulo, organized by the website Omelete. It was visited by an estimated public of 100,000 and had 80 companies involved.[3] Some of the invited artists included Jason Momoa, from Game of Thrones,[3] and Sean Astin, from The Goonies and The Lord of the Rings film trilogy, in which he played the role of Samwise Gamgee.[4][5]

December 7–10, 2017 São Paulo Expo
São Paulo, Brazil		227,451[13]Will Smith, Alicia Vikander, Dylan O'Brien, Tye Sheridan, Simon Pegg, Joel Edgerton, David Ayer, Danai Gurira, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Alice Braga, Henry Zaga, Joel Kinnaman, Nick Jonas, Natalia Tena, Rebecca Madder, Austin St. John, Ariel Olivetti, Paul Azaceta, Arthur Adams, Joyce Chin, Carlos Ruas, Ben Templesmith, Glenn Fabry, Nicola Scott and Bernard Chang.[14]
December 6–9, 2018 São Paulo Expo
São Paulo, Brazil
